attributes.action: Change the way companies charge you when shopping online.
attributes.background: Introduce a law for online shopping that will not allow the companies to immediately take the money out of the consumers account, but block the amount needed and only take the money when the goods are delivered.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for retailers, rather than the UK Government and Parliament to decide.
